translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on Pairs, the Text on the Pairs

analyzed: dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  cittaduka
translated: The Pairs on Mind-Consciousness Element🔽With a mind-object dependent on a non-mind-consciousness element there arises a non-mind-consciousness element.🔽With a mind-object dependent on a non-mind-consciousness element there arises a mind-consciousness element.🔽With a mind-object dependent on a non-mind-consciousness element there arise a non-mind-consciousness element and a mind-consciousness element.

original: Nacittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na cittam dhammam paṭicca na cittaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na cittam dhammam paṭicca
translated: With a mind-consciousness element dependent on a non-mind-consciousness element there arises a non-mind-consciousness element.🔽With a mind-consciousness element and a non-mind-consciousness element dependent on a non-mind-consciousness element there arises a non-mind-consciousness element.🔽With a mind-consciousness element dependent on a non-mind-consciousness element there arises a mind-consciousness element.

original: nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacitto ca nanocitto
analyzed: na no cittaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na cittam dhammam paṭicca na cittaḥ ca na no cittaḥ
translated: With a mind-consciousness element and a non-mind-consciousness element dependent on a non-mind-consciousness element there arises a mind-consciousness element.

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.🔽Nanocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Nacittañca nanocittañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā  na no cittam dhammam paṭicca na cittaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  na cittam ca na no cittam ca dhammam paṭicca na cittaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a mind-consciousness element dependent on a mind-consciousness element there arises a mind-consciousness element.🔽With a mind-consciousness element dependent on a mind-consciousness element there arises a non-mind-consciousness element.🔽With a mind-consciousness element and a non-mind-consciousness element dependent on a mind-consciousness element there arises a non-mind-consciousness element.🔽With a mind-consciousness element and a non-mind-consciousness element dependent on a mind-consciousness element there arises a mind-consciousness element.

analyzed: hetuyā pañca pe avigate pañca sabbattha pañca
translated: With a mind-consciousness element and a non-mind-consciousness element dependent on a mind-consciousness element there arises a mind-consciousness element and a non-mind-consciousness element.🔽With a non-mind-consciousness element dependent on a mind-consciousness element there arises a non-mind-consciousness element.🔽With a non-mind-consciousness element dependent on a mind-consciousness element there arises a mind-consciousness element.🔽With a non-mind-consciousness element and a mind-consciousness element dependent on a mind-consciousness element there arises a mind-consciousness element.🔽With a non-mind-consciousness element and a mind-consciousness element dependent on a mind-consciousness element there arises a non-mind-consciousness element.🔽With a non-mind-consciousness element and a mind-consciousness element dependent on a mind-consciousness element there arises a mind-consciousness element and a non-mind
